abstract: Adam Liptak Sidebar column holds that provocative new study from Harvard business law professor John C Coates IV contends 'corporations have begun to displace individuals as the direct beneficiaries of the First Amendment;' points out Supreme Court has been receptive to arguments based on companies' free-speech rights.
lead_paragraph: “Corporations have begun to displace individuals as the direct beneficiaries of the First Amendment,” a law professor writes in a provocative new study.

headline.main: First Amendment, ‘Patron Saint’ of Protesters, Is Embraced by Corporations
